sys_update_xml.name: content_type_2eea5b364de4710062c55dc1f2a64e2e
sys_update_xml.payload:
ce5b99904de4310062c55dc1f2a64e73 var record = new GlideRecord( 'kb_knowledge' ), kbTitle, kbText; record.addQuery( 'sys_id', '${current.sys_id}' ); record.query(); while ( record.next() ) { kbTitle = record.short_description; kbText = record.text; }

Knowledge Article

${kbTitle}

${kbText}
]]> var msg; if (0 >= gs.dateDiff(current.published, current.sys_updated_on.getGlideObject().getDate(), true)) msg = "${gs.getMessage('Published')} " + current.published; else { msg = "${gs.getMessage('Updated')} "; var d1 = current.sys_updated_on.getGlideObject().getRaw(); var d2 = Packages.com.glide.glideobject.GlideDateTime().getRaw(); var diff = gs.dateDiff(current.sys_updated_on.getDisplayValue(), gs.nowDateTime(), true); if (3600 * 12 > diff) { var s = Packages.com.glide.ui.jelly.tags.mergedata.HistoryTag2().translatedTimeDifferenceString(d2, d1); if (s == null) msg += "${gs.getMessage('just now')}"; else msg += s.toLowerCase() + '${gs.getMessage(" ago")}'; } else { var session = gs.getSession(); var tf = session.getTimeFormat(); session.setTimeFormat(" "); msg += trim(current.sys_updated_on.getDisplayValue()); session.setTimeFormat(tf); } } msg; var thisAttachment = null; var sa = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment'); sa.addQuery('table_name', current.getTableName()); sa.addQuery('table_sys_id', current.getUniqueValue()); sa.query(); while (sa.next()) { var at = new Object(); at.name = sa.file_name + ''; at.sys_id = sa.sys_id + ''; thisAttachment = at; } ${current.short_description.getDisplayValue()}
${jvar_time_text}
 ]]>content_typeadmin2014-11-26 22:49:30true2eea5b364de4710062c55dc1f2a64e2e4kb_knowledgeglobalfalseglobalcontent_type_2eea5b364de4710062c55dc1f2a64e2ekai.yao2015-02-18 16:27:50falsekb_knowledge

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_script_f4abb5a79b0231003fe61c76065498d9
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Scripts used for the Branded CMS' "Report An Issue" page.</description><global>false</global><name>branded-get-help</name><script><![CDATA['use strict';
define( [ 'jquery', 'underscore', 'backbone' ], function( $j, _, Backbone ) {
	var menuIndexMap = {
			'it'         : 0,
			'facilities' : 1,
			'finance'    : 2,
			'hr'         : 3,
			'legal'      : 4,
			'marketing'  : 5
		};

	var selectViewCore = {
			el : '.branded-gethelp-dropdown',

			events : {
				'click .branded-gethelp-dropdown-link' : 'loadDepartment'
			},

			firstLoadDepartment : function() {
				// for when the page loads and we load the initial page config

				var $menus = $j( '.page-get_help .main-content > .row' ),
					$iframe = $j( '#support_frame' ),
					department = ( typeof brandedGethelpDepartment !== 'undefined' ) ? brandedGethelpDepartment : 'it', // determined in the gethelp-select dynamic block
					$departmentMenu = $j( $menus[ menuIndexMap[ department ] ] );

				$menus.hide();
				$departmentMenu.show();

				$iframe[ 0 ].src = $departmentMenu.find( 'a' ).first().attr( 'href' );
			},

			loadDepartment : function( ev ) {
				var $menus = $j( '.page-get_help .main-content > .row' ),
					$dropdownButton = this.$el.parent().find( '.branded-gethelp-dropdown-button' ),
					$dropdownButtonText = this.$el.parent().find( '.branded-gethelp-dropdown-button-text' ),
					$iframe = $j( '#support_frame' ),
					$target = this.$el.find( ev.currentTarget ),
					department = $target.data( 'department' ),
					$departmentMenu;

				// Do nothing if the user selects the same department as the active department
				$dropdownButtonText.empty().append( $target.html() );

				if ( $dropdownButton.data( 'active' ) === $target.data( 'department' ) ) {
					return;
				}

				$dropdownButton.data( 'active', $target.data( 'department' ) );
				$departmentMenu = $j( $menus[ menuIndexMap[ department ] ] );

				$menus.hide();
				$departmentMenu.show();

				$iframe[ 0 ].src = $departmentMenu.find( 'a' ).first().attr( 'href' );
			}
		};

	var selectView = new ( Backbone.View.extend( selectViewCore ) )();

	$j( document ).ready( function() {
		selectView.firstLoadDepartment();
	} );
} );
]]></script><script_name/><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-02-11 13:23:08</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>f4abb5a79b0231003fe61c76065498d9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>28</sys_mod_count><sys_name>branded-get-help</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_f4abb5a79b0231003fe61c76065498d9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>kai.yao</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-03-05 00:14:42</sys_updated_on><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_script_bd49fb924f627100c163e321a310c7fa
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Used on the Knowledgebase page on the Branded CMS Template</description><global>false</global><name>branded-knowledgebase</name><script><![CDATA[// used for the Branded v2 Search/Article page

define( [ 'jquery' ], function( $j ) {
'use strict';

var iframe = document.getElementById( 'knowledge_frame' ),
	$iframe = $j( iframe ),
	$kbDoc = $j( iframe.contentDocument ),
	$kbBody = $kbDoc.find( 'body' ),
	iframeHeight = $kbBody.css( 'height' ),

	resizeIframe = function() {
		iframeHeight = $kbBody.css( 'height' );
		$iframe.css( 'height', iframeHeight );
	},

	checkResize = function() {
		var currentHeight = $kbBody.css( 'height' );

		if ( iframeHeight !== currentHeight ) {
			resizeIframe();
		}
	},

	styleKbIframe = function() {
		// add overriding styles to iframe
		$kbDoc.find( 'head' ).append( '<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/d7fafb024da0710062c55dc1f2a64ee3.cssdbx" />' );

		setInterval( checkResize, 500 );
	},

	updateLayout = function() {
		var $kbContainer = $kbDoc.find( '.application' );

		// re-doing the bootstrap rows and columns
		$kbContainer.removeClass( 'container-fluid' ).addClass( 'row' );
		$kbContainer.children( '.ng-scope' ).addClass( 'container-fluid' );
		$kbContainer.find( '.search-bar .col-xs-12.col-md-12.col-lg-12' ).removeClass( 'col-xs-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12' );

		// resize iframe
		resizeIframe();
	};

$kbDoc.ready( function() {
	styleKbIframe();

	setTimeout( updateLayout, 800 );
} );

} );
]]></script><script_name/><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>kai.yao</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-03-04 21:50:54</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>bd49fb924f627100c163e321a310c7fa</sys_id><sys_mod_count>17</sys_mod_count><sys_name>branded-knowledgebase</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_bd49fb924f627100c163e321a310c7fa</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>kai.yao</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-03-05 00:05:40</sys_updated_on><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="content_block_programmatic"><content_block_programmatic action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><category>general</category><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><frame/><logged_on>false</logged_on><name>Branded CMS Knowledge Base</name><programmatic_content><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">

<g:evaluate jelly="true">
	var kbSysId = RP.getParameterValue( 'kb' ),
		iframe = new GlideRecord( 'content_block_iframe' ),
	url = '$knowledge.do#/search?kb=';

	if ( !!kbSysId ) {
		url += kbSysId;
	}

	gr.initialize();
	gr.frame_name = 'knowledge_frame';
	gr.url = url;
	gr.sizing = 'expand';
	gr.putCurrent();
</g:evaluate>
<g:render_content_block_iframe />
<g:evaluate>
	gr.popCurrent();
</g:evaluate>

</j:jelly>]]></programmatic_content><sys_class_name>content_block_programmatic</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>kai.yao</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-03-04 20:49:21</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>041a23de4f227100c163e321a310c7d1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Branded CMS Knowledge Base</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>content_block_programmatic_041a23de4f227100c163e321a310c7d1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>kai.yao</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-03-05 03:52:29</sys_updated_on><two_phase>false</two_phase></content_block_programmatic></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: content_css_152c224d4de8310062c55dc1f2a64e72
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="content_css"><content_css action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>Branded CMS Layout Styles (Mobile)</name><style>/* Mobile + Default Styles */

.page-title, .branded-admin-nav, #page_timing_div { display: none; }

/* Admin Bar */
.branded-admin-nav { z-index: 0; }
.navbar-inverse .navbar-brand:hover,
.navbar-inverse .navbar-brand:focus { color: #9d9d9d; }

/* Header */
.cms_header { padding-bottom: 20px; }

.cms_menu_super_menu_content {
	display: none;
	position: absolute;
	padding: 10px 15px;
	text-align: left;
	background: #fff;
	border: 1px solid #666;
	z-index: 1;
}

td.cms_header_top_menu { height: 40px; padding-bottom: 20px; line-height: 40px; }

.cms_header span.globalSearch { display: block; padding: 5px; margin-top: 5px; line-height: 20px; border: 1px solid #ccc; }
.cms_header span.globalSearch #sysparm_search { margin-left: 5px; width: 93%; }
.cms_header_login_link { text-align: right; }

.cms_header_resizer_link:last-child { margin-left: 10px; }

td.cms_header_logo, td.cms_header_text { display: block; }
div.cms_header_text { display: none; }

.cms_header_bottom_menu { position: relative; padding-top: 10px; }
.cms_header_bottom_menu .cms_menu_super_menu_bar_item,
.cms_header_bottom_menu .cms_menu_super_menu_bar_item_selected { float: left; }
.cms_header_bottom_menu .cms_menu_section_blocks_title h2 { margin: 0; line-height: 30px; }
.cms_header_bottom_menu .cms_menu_super_menu_bar_item:first-child .menu_section,
.cms_header_bottom_menu .cms_menu_super_menu_bar_item_selected:first-child .menu_section { padding-left: 0; }
.cms_header_bottom_menu .cms_menu_super_menu_bar .menu_section {
	display: block;
	padding: 0 15px;
	font-size: 20px;
	letter-spacing: 0.1em;
	line-height: 1.5;
	text-transform: uppercase;
}

.cms_header_bottom_menu .cms_menu_section_blocks_title h2,
.branded-chat-container {
	font-size: 16px;
	font-weight: 400;
	letter-spacing: 0.1em;
	text-transform: uppercase;
	vertical-align: middle;
}
.branded-chat-container { float: right; min-width: 280px; line-height: 60px; }
.branded-chat-avatar { float:right; margin-left: 10px; border-radius: 50%; }
.branded-chat-container .cms_menu_section_blocks_title h2 { display: none; }
.branded-chat-container .cms_menu_super_menu_content { min-width: 300px; }
.branded-chat-container > div { line-height: 60px; }
.branded-chat-department { line-height: 30px; }
.branded-icon-chat { margin-top: -2px; }
.branded-chat-link { margin-left: 5px; }

/* Home Page */
.page-home .carousel { display: none; }
.page-home .home-block-row a { color: #fff; }
.page-home .home-block-row .cms_menu_section_blocks {
	margin-bottom: 20px;
	color: #fff;
	-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
	-moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
	background: #111;
}
.page-home .home-block-row .cms_menu_section_blocks:last-child { margin-bottom: 0; }

/* Home Pages */
.main-content .cms_menu_section_blocks { display: none !important; }
.main-content .row .cms_menu_section_blocks,
.main-content .home-block-row .cms_menu_section_blocks { display: block !important; }
.main-content .cms_menu_section_blocks .cms_menu_section_blocks_image_left { width: 90px; }
.main-content .cms_menu_section_blocks .cms_menu_section_blocks_title { padding-left: 20px; }
.main-content .cms_menu_section_blocks .cms_menu_section_blocks_title h2 {
	margin: 0;
	font-size: 18px;
	font-weight: 400;
	letter-spacing: 0.05em;
}
.main-content .cms_menu_section_blocks .cms_menu_second_level_text { letter-spacing: 0.05em; font-size: 12px; }
.main-content .cms_menu_section_blocks .cms_menu_separator { display: none; }
.main-content .cms_menu_section_blocks .main-content-menu-block-items { padding: 20px 0 40px 100px; }
.main-content .cms_menu_section_blocks .main-content-menu-block-items td { padding-bottom: 10px; }
.main-content .cms_menu_section_blocks .main-content-menu-block-items tr:last-child td { padding-bottom: 0; }
.main-content .cms_menu_section_blocks .menu_bullet { min-width: 20px; }
.main-content .cms_menu_section_blocks .cms_menu_block_item {
	display: block;
	margin-left: 10px;
	font-size: 18px;
}

.main-content .cms_menu_vertical_block .cms_menu_vertical_blocks_image_left { width: 90px; }
.main-content .cms_menu_vertical_block td.cms_menu_vertical_blocks_title { padding-left: 20px; }
.main-content .cms_menu_vertical_block .cms_menu_vertical_blocks_title h2 {
	margin: 0;
	font-size: 22px;
	font-weight: 400;
	letter-spacing: 0.05em;
	text-transform: uppercase;
}

/* Typeahead Search Bar */
.typeahead-search { margin: 0; }
.typeahead-search .input-group-btn { display: table-cell !important; }
.typeahead-search .twitter-typeahead { display: table-cell !important; width: 100%; }
.typeahead-search .typeahead-search-text {
	box-sizing: border-box;
	width: 100%;
	padding: 5px 30px 5px 10px;
	font-size: 16px;
	background: url( 'images/search_glass.gifx' ) no-repeat scroll 99% 8px;
	border: 1px solid #ccc;
	z-index: 0;
}
.typeahead-search-submit { visibility: hidden; width: 1px; height: 1px; position: absolute; top: -9999px; }

.tt-dropdown-menu {
	width: 100%;
	max-height: 250px;
	overflow-y: auto;
	box-sizing: border-box;
	border: 1px solid #ccc;
	font-size: 16px;
	background: #fff;
}
.tt-suggestion { padding: 10px; }
.typeahead-search-noresults { padding: 10px; width: 100%; color: #4c4c4c; }
.typeahead-search-suggestion-title {
	margin: 0;
	color: #4c4c4c;
	font-size: 16px;
	font-weight: normal;
	line-height: 1.2;
}
.typeahead-search-suggestion-text {
	overflow: hidden;
	margin: 0;
	color: #999;
	font-size: 14px;
	font-weight: 300;
	line-height: 1.5;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
	max-height: 37px;
}

.tt-suggestion.tt-cursor { background: #278EFC; }
.tt-suggestion.tt-cursor .typeahead-search-suggestion-title { color: #fff; }
.tt-suggestion.tt-cursor .typeahead-search-suggestion-text { color: #fff; }

/* Iframe pages */
.branded-page-title {
	margin: 20px 0 20px;
	font-size: 24px;
	letter-spacing: 0.05em;
	line-height: 1;
	text-transform: uppercase;
}
#catalog_frame, #support_frame { margin-top: 20px; }

/* Get Help + Catalog */
.page-get_help .main-content > .row,
.page-service_catalog .main-content > .row { display: none; }

.page-get_help .main-content .cms_menu_section_blocks .cms_menu_section_blocks_title { padding-left: 5px; }
.branded-gethelp-selection-container,
.branded-catalog-selection-container { margin: 20px 0 10px; }
.branded-gethelp-label,
.branded-catalog-label { margin-right: 15px; }
.branded-gethelp-selection-container .btn-group,
.branded-catalog-selection-container .btn-group { display: inline-block !important; }
.branded-gethelp-selection-container .caret,
.branded-catalog-selection-container .caret { float: right; position: relative; top: 10px; }
.branded-gethelp-selection-container .branded-gethelp-dropdown,
.branded-catalog-selection-container .branded-catalog-dropdown { width: 100%; }
.branded-gethelp-selection-container .branded-gethelp-dropdown-button,
.branded-catalog-selection-container .branded-catalog-dropdown-button { width: 210px; padding: 5px 15px; text-align: left; }
.branded-gethelp-selection-container .branded-gethelp-dropdown-button:hover,
.branded-catalog-selection-container .branded-catalog-dropdown-button:hover { box-shadow: none; }

/* knowledge/catalog */
.branded-main-container { padding-top: 40px; }
.branded-section-title {
	margin: 0;
	font-size: 18px;
	letter-spacing: 0.05em;
	text-transform: uppercase;
}

#knowledge_frame { min-height: 450px; }

/* Catalog styles */
.page-service_catalog .main-content > .row { display: none; }
/*.branded-catalog-container { padding-top: 20px; }

.branded-catalog-main { padding-top: 20px; }
.branded-catalog-main-list,
.branded-catalog-secondary-list { list-style-type: none; padding: 0; }

.branded-requested-title,
.branded-related-title,
.branded-mostrequested-title { margin-bottom: 20px; text-transform: none; }

.branded-main-item-link,
.branded-secondary-item-link { display: block; }
.branded-main-item { margin-bottom: 30px; }
.branded-main-item-link {
	height: 170px;
	padding: 30px 10px;
	text-align: center;
	border: 1px solid #ccc;
}
.branded-main-item-image { min-width: 50px; max-width: 100%; }
.branded-main-item-title {
	overflow: hidden;
	padding-top: 10px;
	max-height: 70px;
}

.branded-catalog-modal .modal-dialog { width: 900px; }
.branded-catalog-modal .modal-body { min-height: 700px; }
.branded-catalog-modal .branded-catalog-modal-iframe { min-height: 660px; }*/

/*.branded-mostrequested { padding: 20px; background-color: #f1f2f3; }
.branded-secondary-item { margin-top: 10px; padding-bottom: 10px; }
.branded-secondary-item-link {
	height: 100px;
	background: #ccc;
	border: 1px solid #999;
}*/

.kb-list-article { margin-bottom: 20px; }
.kb-list-article-views,
.kb-list-article-votes { text-align: center; }
.kb-list-article-views.not-viewed,
.kb-list-article-votes.not-useful { color: #999; }
.kb-list-article-views.viewed { color: inherit; }
.kb-list-article-views.viewed .kb-list-article-views-content { border-color: #333; }
.kb-list-article-votes.useful { color: #7ac143; }
.kb-list-article-votes.useful .kb-list-article-votes-content { border-color: #7ac143; }
.kb-list-article-views-content,
.kb-list-article-votes-content { padding: 15px 0; border: 1px solid #f1f1f1; }
.kb-list-article-views-value,
.kb-list-article-votes-value { font-weight: bold; }
.kb-list-article-text div:empty { display: none; }
.kb-list-article-short-description { margin: 0; font-size: 16px; }
.kb-list-article-description {
	overflow: hidden;
	margin: 5px 0;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
	white-space: nowrap;
}
.kb-list-article-meta { color: #999; font-size: 12px; }
.kb-list-article-author-name { font-weight: bold; }

/* Footer */
.branded-footer {
	margin-top: 40px;
	padding-top: 40px;
	padding-bottom: 40px;
	font-size: 12px;
	font-weight: 500;
	letter-spacing: 0.05em;
	text-transform: uppercase;
	border-top: 1px solid #ddd;
}
.branded-footer-left,
.branded-footer-right { text-align: center; }
</style><sys_class_name>content_css</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2014-11-21 08:55:40</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>152c224d4de8310062c55dc1f2a64e72</sys_id><sys_mod_count>207</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Branded CMS Layout Styles (Mobile)</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>content_css_152c224d4de8310062c55dc1f2a64e72</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>kai.yao</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-03-05 17:35:46</sys_updated_on><type>local</type><url/></content_css></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_script_203710a84f2e7100ce7522788310c72d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Drives the UI for the Catalog page in the Branded CMS Template.</description><global>false</global><name>branded-catalog</name><script><![CDATA[define( [ 'jquery', 'underscore', 'backbone' ], function( $j, _, Backbone ) {
'use strict';

var iframe = document.getElementById( 'catalog_frame' ),
	$iframe = $j( iframe ),
	iframeHeight,
	menuIndexMap = {
		'facilities' : 0,
		'finance'    : 1,
		'hr'         : 2,
		'it'         : 3,
		'legal'      : 4,
		'marketing'  : 5
	},

	resizeIframe = function() {
		var $iframeDoc = $j( iframe.contentDocument ),
			$iframeBody = $iframeDoc.find( 'body' );

		iframeHeight = $iframeBody.css( 'height' );
		$iframe.css( 'height', iframeHeight );
	},

	checkResize = function() {
		var $iframeDoc = $j( iframe.contentDocument ),
			$iframeBody = $iframeDoc.find( 'body' ),
			currentHeight = $iframeBody.css( 'height' );

		if ( iframeHeight !== currentHeight ) {
			resizeIframe();
		}
	},

	styleIframe = function() {
		var $iframeDoc = $j( iframe.contentDocument );

		// add overriding styles to iframe
		$iframeDoc.find( 'head' ).append( '<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/d7fafb024da0710062c55dc1f2a64ee3.cssdbx" />' );

		setInterval( checkResize, 500 );
	},

	updateLayout = function() {
		var $iframeDoc = $j( iframe.contentDocument ),
			$iframeBody = $iframeDoc.find( 'body' );

		iframeHeight = $iframeBody.css( 'height' );

		// resize iframe
		resizeIframe();
	},

	selectViewCore = {
		el : '.branded-catalog-dropdown',

		events : {
			'click .branded-catalog-dropdown-link' : 'loadCatalog'
		},

		redirectIframe : function( $catalogMenu ) {
			iframe.src = $catalogMenu.find( 'a' ).first().attr( 'href' );
			$j( iframe.contentDocument ).ready( function() {
				setTimeout( function() {
					styleIframe();
					updateLayout();
				}, 800 );
			} );
		},

		firstLoadCatalog : function() {
			// for when the page loads and we load the initial page config

			var $menus = $j( '.page-service_catalog .main-content > .row' ),
				catalog = ( typeof brandedCatalog !== 'undefined' && menuIndexMap[ brandedCatalog ] ) ? brandedCatalog : 'facilities', // determined in the catalog-select dynamic block
				$catalogMenu = $j( $menus[ menuIndexMap[ catalog ] ] );

			$menus.hide();
			$catalogMenu.show();

			if ( !$catalogMenu.find( 'a' ).first().attr( 'href' ) ) {
				console.log( $catalogMenu );
			}

			this.redirectIframe( $catalogMenu );
		},

		loadCatalog : function( ev ) {
			var $menus = $j( '.page-service_catalog .main-content > .row' ),
				$dropdownButton = this.$el.parent().find( '.branded-catalog-dropdown-button' ),
				$dropdownButtonText = this.$el.parent().find( '.branded-catalog-dropdown-button-text' ),
				$target = this.$el.find( ev.currentTarget ),
				catalog = $target.data( 'catalog' ),
				$catalogMenu;

			// Do nothing if the user selects the same catalog as the active catalog
			$dropdownButtonText.empty().append( $target.html() );

			if ( $dropdownButton.data( 'active' ) === $target.data( 'catalog' ) ) {
				return;
			}

			$dropdownButton.data( 'active', $target.data( 'catalog' ) );
			$catalogMenu = $j( $menus[ menuIndexMap[ catalog ] ] );

			$menus.hide();
			$catalogMenu.show();

			this.redirectIframe( $catalogMenu );
		}
	},

	selectView = new ( Backbone.View.extend( selectViewCore ) )();

$j( document ).ready( function() {
	selectView.firstLoadCatalog();
} );

} );
]]></script><script_name/><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>kai.yao</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-02-26 18:53:54</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>203710a84f2e7100ce7522788310c72d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>54</sys_mod_count><sys_name>branded-catalog</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_203710a84f2e7100ce7522788310c72d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>kai.yao</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-03-05 19:53:41</sys_updated_on><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>This script loads the layout/bootstrapping for the Branded CMS template as well as any custom functionality using various JS libraries.</description><global>false</global><name>branded-cms-init</name><script><![CDATA[// This script loads the layout/bootstrapping for the Branded CMS template as well as any custom functionality using various JS libraries.
var jquery;

( function( $j ) {
	var requireConfig = {
			deps : [ 'jquery', 'brandedlayout' ],

			paths : {
				'jquery' : '/branded-jquery.min.jsdbx?dummy_ext=',
				'bootstrap' : '/bootstrap.min.jsdbx?dummy_ext=',
				'underscore' : '/branded-lodash.jsdbx?dummy_ext=',
				'backbone' : '/branded-backbone.jsdbx?dummy_ext=',
				'infinitescroll' : '/jquery.infinitescroll.min.jsdbx?dummy_ext=',
				'brandedlayout' : '/branded-cms-layout.jsdbx?dummy_ext=',
				'brandedgethelp' : '/branded-get-help.jsdbx?dummy_ext=',
				'brandedtypeaheadbundle' : '/branded-typeahead.bundle.jsdbx?dummy_ext=',
				'brandedtypeaheadsetup' : '/branded-typeahead-setup.jsdbx?dummy_ext=',
				// 'brandedknowledgesearch' : '/branded-knowledge-search.jsdbx?dummy_ext=',
				// 'brandedknowledgearticle' : '/branded-knowledge-article.jsdbx?dummy_ext=',
				'brandedknowledgebase' : '/branded-knowledgebase.jsdbx?dummy_ext=',
				'brandedcatalog' : '/branded-catalog.jsdbx?dummy_ext='
			},

			shim : {
				'brandedlayout' : { 'deps' : [ 'jquery' ] },
				'bootstrap' : { 'deps' : [ 'jquery' ] }
			},

			callback : function() {
				jquery = jQuery.noConflict();
			}
		};

	$j.getScript( '/require.jsdbx' ).done( function() {
		var pathJsMap = {
				'/branded/get_help.do' : 'brandedgethelp',
				// '/branded/knowledge_search.do' : 'brandedknowledgesearch',
				// '/branded/knowledge.do' : 'brandedknowledgearticle',
				'/branded/knowledgebase.do' : 'brandedknowledgebase',
				'/branded/service_catalog.do' : 'brandedcatalog'
			};

		requirejs.config( requireConfig );

		if ( pathJsMap[ window.location.pathname ] ) {
			requirejs( [ pathJsMap[ window.location.pathname ] ], function() {} );
		}
	} );
} )( jQuery );]]></script><script_name/><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-02-09 22:33:32</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>ce7625079b0231003fe61c7606549830</sys_id><sys_mod_count>34</sys_mod_count><sys_name>branded-cms-init</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_ce7625079b0231003fe61c7606549830</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>kai.yao</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-03-04 21:45:50</sys_updated_on><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="content_css"><content_css action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>Branded CMS Layout Styles (Large Screens)</name><style>@media ( min-width: 1200px ) {
	.page-home .carousel-inner,
	.page-home .carousel-inner > .item { height: 450px; }

	.main-content .cms_menu_section_blocks .cms_menu_section_blocks_title h2 { font-size: 20px; }
	.main-content .cms_menu_section_blocks .cms_menu_second_level_text { font-size: 14px; }
}
</style><sys_class_name>content_css</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2014-11-24 15:27:29</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>8592e38e4d60710062c55dc1f2a64e12</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Branded CMS Layout Styles (Large Screens)</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>content_css_8592e38e4d60710062c55dc1f2a64e12</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>kai.yao</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-03-04 19:24:34</sys_updated_on><type>local</type><url/></content_css></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: content_css_d7fafb024da0710062c55dc1f2a64ee3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="content_css"><content_css action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>Branded CMS ServiceNow Overrides</name><style>/* Overriding default CMS/Iframed styles */
body { height: auto; margin: 0; }

table, input, select, button, input.text, textarea, input.button {
	font-size: inherit;
	font-family: inherit;
}

/* Disabling Heisenberg */
.modal-backdrop { z-index: 0; }

@media (min-width: 550px) {
	.container {
		width: auto;
	}
}

/* Iframed forms and lists */
html[data-doctype=true] body[data-formName="ui_page_render"] { margin: 0; }
html[data-doctype=true] div.section_header_content_no_scroll { overflow: visible; }
div.form_title { font-size: 14px; }
.label { display: block; font-size: inherit; line-height: inherit; }
.label label { margin-bottom: 0; }

.breadcrumb { padding: 0; background: transparent; }

/* Service Catalog */
#category_description, #navigatordetailTop, #back_cell, .header_bar_title { display: none !important; }

.sc_category_item .details_div td,
.sc_category_item_hover .details_div td,
.catalog_description > table > tbody > tr > td { padding: 10px; }
.sc_category_item .details_div h3:first-child,
.sc_category_item_hover .details_div h3:first-child,
.catalog_description > table > tbody > tr > td > h3:first-child { margin-top: 0; }
html[data-doctype=true] tr.header { background: transparent; }
html[data-doctype=true] div.sc_category_item, html[data-doctype=true] div.sc_category_item_hover { padding: 20px 0 !important; }
html[data-doctype=true] .sc_category_item_left { padding-right: 20px; }

/* Catalog Shopping Cart Container */
#cartContent { padding: 10px; border: 1px solid #ccc; }
.sc_cat_set_window, .sc_cart_window { margin: 0; border: 0 none; }
.sc_cart_window { min-width: 175px; width: 100% !important; }

/* Catalog Shopping Cart Top */
#cartContent_header { padding-bottom: 10px; }
#cart { padding: 0 10px; border: 0 none; }
#adder { border: 1px solid #CCC; margin-bottom: 10px; padding: 10px; }
#qty { margin-top: 10px; }

/* Catalog Shopping Cart Bottom */
.sc_cart_subtotal_row td { padding-top: 10px; }

/* Live Feed */
.main-content .live_feed_column { padding: 0; }

/* Knowledge */
.row.search-bar { background: transparent; border-bottom: 0 none; }
.row.search-bar form { padding-left: 0; }
.row.search-bar .buttons { padding-right: 0; }
.row.homepage { margin: 60px -15px 0; }

/* Bootstrap Buttons */
.btn-default:hover, .btn-destructive-subdued:hover, .btn-success-subdued:hover, .nav-segmented > li:hover, .btn-default.hover, .hover.btn-destructive-subdued, .hover.btn-success-subdued, .nav-segmented > li.hover { box-shadow: none; }
</style><sys_class_name>content_css</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2014-11-24 17:14:12</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>d7fafb024da0710062c55dc1f2a64ee3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>33</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Branded CMS ServiceNow Overrides</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>content_css_d7fafb024da0710062c55dc1f2a64ee3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>kai.yao</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-03-05 18:24:40</sys_updated_on><type>local</type><url/></content_css></record_update>
